abstract: A Glimpse at an Enlightened Perl
author: Chris Prather <chris@prather.org>
name: Task-Kensho

run: bash -c "if [[ `dirname %d` != .build ]]; then test -e .ackrc && grep -q -- '--ignore-dir=%d' .ackrc || echo '--ignore-dir=%d' >> .ackrc; fi; if [[ %d =~ ^%n-[.[:xdigit:]]+$ ]]; then rm -f .latest; ln -s %d .latest; fi"

Dist::Zilla::Plugin::OnlyCorePrereqs.starting_version: to be determined from perl prereq
